masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote:
"You promised to help serve Christmas dinner at the shelter, but you never showed. Those families were counting on us—counting on YOU. I had to turn people away because we were short-staffed. I don't want excuses. I want to know: do you actually care?"

Requirements

  • Make it right with the shelter—actions, not words
  • Figure out how to balance hero work and commitments
  • This one stings—you let people down
